title: The hutment dweller actually residing at present, who has purchased the censused structure with photo pass, if any, from any of the categories above shall be held eligible for rehabilitation under S
clause_text: The hutment dweller actually residing at present, who has purchased the censused structure with photo pass, if any, from any of the categories above shall be held eligible for rehabilitation under S.R.S., provided such transfer has been regularized. Provided further that the original owner of the censused structure who has sold the said, but shall be deemed to be ineligible for any alternative subsidized accommodation in any of the government scheme.
section: Provision relating to allotment of tenements either in situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent to the other non-protected occupiers

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
